const splitArray = (arr, leftSum, rightSum, index) => {
  // Base case 
  if (index < 0) {
    return (leftSum === rightSum); // returns true or false 
  }

  // Calculate the sum of value at current index 
  const curVal = arr[index];

  // Try to include the current number in the left part 
  if (splitArray(arr, leftSum + curVal, rightSum, index - 1)) {
    return true;
  } 

  // If not possible to include the current number in the left part, 
  // try to include it in the right part 
  if (splitArray(arr, leftSum, rightSum + curVal, index - 1)) {
    return true;
  }

  // If not possible to include the current number in either the left or 
  // the right part, return false 
  return false;
};
